  • Method Details

    • getOwner

      String getOwner()
      Returns:
      The owner of the item, only the owner can pick the item up

    • setOwner

      void setOwner(String name)
      Parameters:
      name - The UUID for the owner of the item, only the owner can pick up the item (note that the item can also be picked up if the lifetime - age is equal or smaller than 200)

    • getPickupDelay

      int getPickupDelay()
      Returns:
      Ticks remaining before it can be picked up (32767 is infinite)

    • setPickupDelay

      void setPickupDelay(int delay)
      Parameters:
      delay - Delay before the item can be picked up (32767 is infinite delay)

    • getAge

      long getAge()
      Specified by:
      getAge in interface IEntity<T extends ItemEntity>
      Returns:
      Returns the age of the item

    • setAge

      void setAge(long age)
      Parameters:
      age - Age of the item (-32767 is infinite age)

    • getLifeSpawn

      int getLifeSpawn()
      Returns:
      When the age reaches this the item despawns

    • setLifeSpawn

      void setLifeSpawn(int age)
      Parameters:
      age - Age at which the item despawns
